text: Futhi ningaphikisani nabantu bencwadi ngaphandle kwaleyo (ndlela) engcono kakhulu, ngaphandle kwalabo abenza okungalungile phakathi kwabo futhi yithini, â€œsiyakholwa kulokho okwambulwa kuthina nokwambulwa kunina futhi uNkulunkulu wethu noNkulunkulu wenu munye futhi thina siyazithoba ngaphansi kwentando yakhe
